channel.title: c3a2e Switches grouped with maindoor
channel.description:
In Map c3a2e all switches are Grouped witch a maindoor. I blocked this door, so it goes down and up again and every swicht in the whole map moves with this door :slight_smile:
see pic attached
And by the way: Thanks for this awesome Mod! If you take a donate, i will defenetly do it! ![bm_c3a2e0002.jpg|682x383](upload://acqplDrUlArxSUBWp5DskLZbnSR.jpeg)
